titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROLOGY QUESTION D) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (NEUROLOGY QUESTION D) is the PERSON SCORE for question D of the Neurology section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Has this child ever had ventriculo-peritoneal shunt inserted?".
